elements.name: question5
elements.title: Marvin buys a three-year-old horse. A veterinary examination reveals that the horse is at least thirteen years old. Can he contest the contract? Which article governs this incident?
elements.correctAnswer: This is a case of deliberate deception. Marvin can contest the contract (Art. 28 OR).

elements.name: question9
elements.title: Karin Hermann threatens her colleague with consequences for repeated lateness at work unless she takes over her apartment for rent. The colleague agrees. Can she still defend herself?
elements.correctAnswer: Yes, contracts that come about as a result of fear are also voidable (Art. 29 CO).
